description: This file defines the ProfileController class in an ASP.NET Core Web API project. It handles HTTP requests related to user profile operations, such as retrieving the current user's profile, updating it, fetching other users' profiles by ID, and searching for users. The controller interacts with the IProfileService to perform these operations and includes route definitions, authorization attributes, and documentation comments.

classes.name: ProfileController
classes.description: Controller class responsible for handling user profile API endpoints, including retrieval, update, and search functionalities.

methods.name: GetMe
methods.description: Handles GET request to retrieve the current authenticated user's profile.

methods.name: UpdateMe
methods.description: Handles PUT request to update the current user's profile with provided data.

methods.name: GetById
methods.description: Handles GET request to retrieve another user's profile by their GUID ID.

methods.name: Search
methods.description: Handles GET request to search users by query string, with pagination support.
